oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: At Ease - 1940-03-20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's At Ease radio program, originally broadcast 1940-03-20. Featuring Jane Grant (singer), the Soothenaires (orchestra), Beasley Smith (musical director), and Ott Devine (announcer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jane Grant; Soothenaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Opening statement (Ott Devine) -- Penthouse Serenade / I Love You (medley) -- Last Night's Gardenia's (Jane Grant vocals) -- Tango Argentino -- The Man I Love (Jane Grant vocals) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ott Devine)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); At Ease (Radio program); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Soothenaires (Musical group); Grant, Jane (Singer); Smith, Beasley
